Title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials

Their journey takes them to the Scorch, a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles. Teaming up with resistance fighters, the Gladers take on WCKDâ€™s vastly superior forces and uncover its shocking plans for them all.
